item.title: Apache Spark安装和环境配置
item.description: Excerpt The Desiderata (part 2) by Max Ehrmann, 1927 If you compare yourself with others, you may become vain or bitter; for always there will be greater and lesser persons than yourself. Enjoy your achievements as well as your plans. Keep interested in your own career, however humble; it is a real possession in the changing fortunes of time. –TBC
